mapper.select: select id, b.manage_com, (select short_name from ldcom ld where ld.comcode = b.manage_com) manage_com_name, agent_code, (select name from la_agent agent where agent.agent_code = a.agent_code) agent_code_name, a.agent_group, b.branch_attr, b.name branch_name, a.branch_type, a.start_date, a.end_date from la_branch_to_agent a ${ew.getCustomSqlSegment}
